About Contact Talks Writing

Hi, I'm Cooper Hollmaier. I have a passion for developing digital products that are fast, sustainable, and accessible by default.

Current Projects

I'm currently supporting the development of an accessibility product team at a large retailer based in the Pacific Northwest. This coming spring, I'll continue that work while teaching a course at Iowa State University on Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

When I'm not working, you'll find me writing, giving talks, tinkering with code, and getting outside.

Articles

I often write down my thoughts about remote work, accessibility, SEO, and software engineering. My most recent article was on changes you can make to your workflow to get more done.

Talks

I've spoken at several events about technical SEO, digital accessibility, content marketing, and digital marketing. Recently, I had the great pleasure of appearing on Moz's Whiteboard Friday in a 3-part series on accessibility.

If you'd like to hire me for your event, please check out my speaker rider first.
